metadata.title: CVE-2013-7436 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
noVNC before 0.5 does not set the secure flag for a cookie in an httpssession, which makes it easier for remote attackers to capture this cookieby intercepting its transmission within an http session.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-7436` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

novnc - 1:0.4+dfsg+1+20131010+gitf68af8af3d-4
python-novnc - 1:0.4+dfsg+1+20131010+gitf68af8af3d-4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: novnc package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:0.4+dfsg+1+20131010+gitf68af8af3d-4').
